name: SideBreaker
description:
Pick a side to build your character! WASD to move, IJKL to shoot. Click on the blaster button and place your cannons on the side of your character after every round.

This is my first solo game jam submission, and I used it as a great way to learn the godot engine.

Made with Godot in 72 hours for the 2022 GeoJam.

Sound effects from freesound.org

Music by Patrick de Artega
